body_text: Making this blue to indicate that it is selected is pretty subtle. It is easy to get it confused with the approval tags. I think we should either use a different UI treatment to show the selected revision. In @Osmose's version, the Timeline.Item used a different icon for the selected revision, I think that worked well.
